text: Giovanni Lajolo (born 3 January 1935) is an Italian cardinal and former president of the Pontifical Commission for Vatican City State and president of the Governatorate of Vatican City State. Lajolo was born on 3 January 1935 in Novara, Italy. In 2005 Lajolo was awarded Knight Grand Cross of the Order of Merit of the Italian Republic.quirinale.it ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Italian Roman Catholic archbishops Category:Cardinals of the Roman Catholic Church Category:People from Novara
